Articles.Content:
Running 0 mods, no conflicting software, reinstalled, reset PC, tried launching through steam/desktop/.exe. Not sure what else to do, I've played the game many times before (90 some hours logged :/) never really had any issues other than an occasional crash. Running windows 8 64 bit, I've seen that this is a conflict, but It's ran fine for me many times before. I can't find a crash log, but that may be due to the reinstall.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/1ddcx4dknz16c50/KSP.log?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1ddcx4dknz16c50/KSP.log?dl=0)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/cnogjodqoml23ue/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cnogjodqoml23ue/output_log.txt?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-07T00:10:34Z" title="06/07/2015 12:10  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 7, 2015</time> by true659**

Hi true659, the KSP.log is in the game folder and output\_log.txt is in KSPData, also we'll need your dxdiag log, you can post them on dropbox or pastebin then link them here.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/aRFDs)

The 32bit version of KSP should run fine on Windows x64, it's only the 64bit Unity3D game executable that has some issues so it was removed for 1.0

Okay so I found a fix. I realized that Nvidia dropped an update yesterday and that's the only thing that has changed. So I went to the Nvidia folder in my drive and ran the setup.exe. Not sure if it got corrupted along the way through the install or what. But apparently rerunning the setup fixed it. It's 337.88 so if anyone's having a similar issue hope it helps. If anyone could give insight on why that caused that it'd be great to hear, I'm assuming it was just a bad install, it caused a few of my games to go down.
